channel.title: Guangchuang's software packages
channel.description: Recent content on Guangchuang's software packages

item.title: Material for Hugo
item.description: I have developed 6 packages on CRAN and 8 on Bioconductor. For CRAN packages, you can use install.packages() to install them directly and for Bioconductor packages, you need to follow the guide on package homepage by using biocLite() to install. If you are interesting, please visit their homepage to learn more. CRAN badger: r packageTitle('badger', 'CRAN') dlstats: r packageTitle('dlstats', 'CRAN') emojifont: r packageTitle('emojifont', 'CRAN') ggimage: r packageTitle('ggimage', 'CRAN') rvcheck: r packageTitle('rvcheck', 'CRAN') scatterpie: r packageTitle('scatterpie', 'CRAN') Bioconductor
